叩拜.definition: to bow in salute; to kowtow

叩關.definition: to knock at the gate (old); to make an approach; to invade; to attack the goal (sports)

叩頭.definition: to kowtow (traditional greeting, esp. to a superior, involving kneeling and pressing one's forehead to the ground); also written 磕頭|磕头[ke1 tou2]

叩首.definition: to kowtow; also written 磕頭|磕头[ke1 tou2]
